column5: well, im a long time viewer  but this is my first time posting, i was gonna go ice fishing tomorrow but  mother nature doesnt want to co operate, so im thinking of doing some winter steelheading, does anyone know how the tribs are running or are they completley unfishable? thanks guys
Fishable. Dead-drift a single-egg or SanJuan worm. Use a strike indicator & don't drift under them.
Nope, sorry bud.  NOT fishable in your wildest dreams.  I hit three tribs today, dangerous and unfishable.  Stay in bed, give it three days or so and it should br prime
Yo Kempy where you on Georgian Bay?
no sir, I guess I was just assuming this dude meant the east tribs.  Its messy out here, very messy
